title.rendered: Say no to child labour, say yes to school

content.rendered: Say No to Child Labour, Say Yes to School” campaign was held at Wardha on 30th April 2017 on Sunday. Nearly 17 to 18 children from slum area of ‘Nalwadi’, Wardha participated enthusiastically in this campaign along with volunteers from Smile Foundation. The children held flash cards with various slogans related to Anti Child Labour. Other people like Mr. Sandeep Singh Thakur from Pratham Education Foundation and Mr. Sengare who is a Professor in Wardha Engineering College also joined in the campaign to support the cause.
